Server module
=============

Server's module.

Launch:
`python server.py`

* arguments:
* -p - Number port. Default 7777


server.py
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Main server module

	:members:

.. autoclass:: server.server.Sock
	:members:

.. autoclass:: server.server.Server
	:members:
